title: PROJECT SENTIMENT: THE DUYGU ADAMI HEIST
subtitle: A Play in One Act — The Big One
objective: Securing the Duygu Adamı—the heart, the soul, the man of feeling himself
atmosphere: Cold. Grey. Smelling of wet concrete and cheap gin.

leads.description: The Setup. Structure. Confidence of a man who owns the street.

ensemble.description: Against the wall. Caught looking the wrong way.

director.description: The ghost in the machine. Watching from afar, making sure the rhythm is right.

acts.title: THE SETUP (Entry)
acts.key_moment: Routine check becomes something else. The air thickens.
acts.dialogue_hook: You ever been to a chai stall, mate?

acts.title: THE SCAN (Conflict)
acts.key_moment: The word 'Duygu Adamı' hangs in the air like smoke.
acts.dialogue_hook: The market wants feeling, mate. The market wants the Duygu Adamı.

acts.title: THE OVERRIDE (Climax)
acts.key_moment: The violin case opens. Not a Thompson. A cassette tape.
acts.dialogue_hook: You don't survive by being the thermometer. You survive by being the thermostat. You set the temperature.
acts.prop: Cassette tape labeled 'DUYGU ADAMI — THE VOICE OF GOD'

acts.title: THE FADE (Resolution)
acts.key_moment: The North Siders are no longer against the wall—they're sitting on the floor, listening.
acts.voiceover: The heist wasn't about taking. It was about becoming. The Duygu Adamı isn't a man. It's a frequency.

lighting.override: Warm, amber glow (chai stall, heritage, warmth)
lighting.climax: Flicker and strobe (Istanbul club, Karachi streets)
lighting.fade: Fade to black with single spotlight on cassette

sound.override: Cassette plays—single note (oud/ney) → drum solo (darbuka, davul) → tea being poured
sound.fade: Voiceover over tea-pouring sound. No music. Just the ritual.

props: Cassette tape labeled 'DUYGU ADAMI — THE VOICE OF GOD'
Chai stall imagery projected on back wall

costumes.police: Period-accurate blues with subtle Turkish/Cypriot details (embroidered cuffs, evil eye pin)
costumes.north_siders: Standard 1920s gangster attire, worn and tired—the Old Way

the_payday.result: The frequency is now audible. The title deed is signed. The eulogy is written.
the_payday.status: The bag is in the vault.

codebase_integration.sync_note: The Police (Authority) = Mehmed II energy (thermostat). Duygu Adamı = Constantine XI in the breach (door out with dignity). Same frequency as 1453; Royal Play carries Kayser-i Rûm to JAN.

themes.primary: Emotion first. British-born Turkish Cypriot sincerity.
secondary: The Old Way vs The New Frequency
Chai stall tradition meets modern cloud

signature_lines: The market wants feeling, mate. The market wants the Duygu Adamı.
You don't survive by being the thermometer. You survive by being the thermostat. You set the temperature.
The heist wasn't about taking. It was about becoming.
The chai stall in your pocket. Heritage in the cloud. Peace and abundance in every draw.

meta.tone: Cold garage. Warm heart. Turkish soul mixed with London grit.
meta.rhythm: Talk about 'Ahmet' and 'The Firm' in the same breath.
meta.philosophy: Dünya döner bir değirmen. Aşk olsun çevirene.

status_final: ACTION CALLED. The Play is Running. The Duygu Adamı is secured.
